segment-1.title: MEET JP THOR
segment-1.description:
A founder, engineer, and explorer.

JP's limitless curiosity drives him to challenge humanity's limits.

Championing the ACCEL movement; a relentless pursuit of truth, innovation and growth.

segment-2.title: FOUNDER
segment-2.description: 'Plan to succeed, expect to fail'. Nothing is more potent than creating nothing into something. Create, Create, Create

segment-3.description: 'Ideas are cheap, execution is everything'. The world is built by engineers and creators. Seek to learn and build every day.

segment-6.title: BIO
segment-6.description_1: JP, born on Bathurst Island, North of Darwin, was homeschooled in rural Northern territory, finishing Top 6 for the state in his final year.
segment-6.description_2: He then joined the Air Force and studied Aeronautical Engineering, graduating at the top of his year in 2009 with First Class Honours.
segment-6.description_3: After completing his pilot training – earning top course awards – he began Fighter training in 2012.
segment-6.description_4: JP’s final assignment to conclude his career as an Air Force pilot was flying bombers, with operational deployments. He ended up accumulating 2000+ flight hours and flew all over the world.
segment-6.description_5: In 2013, he transitioned to crypto, initially building various decentralised applications. In 2018, he began building a decentralised platform called THORChain under the pseudonym “Leena” along with a team of 5 engineers.
segment-6.description_6: Within 18 months of launching, THORChain reached a market value of $1 billion. In 2024, JP turned over THORChain to the community and revealed himself. Currently, it is the largest decentralised liquidity protocol in the world, with a market value of over 2$ billion and over $1 billion in deposits.
segment-6.description_7: Now, JP is working on several other projects to solve key problems in the crypto space.

segment-7.title: JP’s Core Principles
segment-7.description: JP recognises humanity needs to be re-activated, and the imperative to accelerate is stronger than ever before. Now is the time. The following principles guide JP's thinking.

cards.title:
1

Simplify It!
cards.description: Get to the core of every problem. Break down issues into their fundamental elements. Avoid artificial cognitive hurdles. Minimise latency, maximise bandwidth. Don't do anything that slows you down.

cards.title:
2

Empower Others.
cards.description: Collectively we are more capable. Inspire those around you to accelerate with you. Often people don't know what they are capable of - they simply need empowerment. Coordinate through a shared vision.

cards.title:
3

Optimistic, Always.
cards.description: 'I think, therefore I am'. You can manifest your future by sheer determination and positive willpower. A healthy mental state is 100x more productive than an unhealthy one. Stare down adversity with momentum.

cards.title:
4

Get in the Arena!
cards.description: You cannot solve the problem without first understanding the problem. You cannot understand the problem unless you are in the arena and pivoting, iterating and taking on feedback as fast as you can.

cards.title:
5

Take Risk.
cards.description: The universe presents us with adversity everyday. Tackle the unknown and reap the rewards or deal with the consequences. Everything is risky - navigating advserity is demonstrating your intelligence.

cards.title:
6

Build in Public
cards.description: Set the memes free. Avoid NDAs, Patents, Exclusive Copyright. Build in public; the good ideas flourish, the bad ideas die. We are here to learn, build, create as we upgrade Humanity's Memetic Repository.
